about_the_game:
Crazy Lemmings is a fascinating arcade game in which crazy lemmings try to find a cure for madness. Small rodents rush to their target at breakneck speed, jumping over various obstacles. You will find a dangerous journey through forests, fields and the countryside, where treacherous traps with sharp teeth lurk.
The main feature of the game is that you control several characters at once. Not all of them will be able to survive in this crazy race - some lemmings will have to be sacrificed to get to the goal.

Features :

  • The ability to play for all characters at the same time;
  • Bright, colorful locations;
  • Realistic physics, thoughtful details;
  • Many deadly traps and enemies;
  • Simple, intuitive gameplay.

name: Crazy Lemmings Demo
short_description: Control entire armies of lemmings and solve puzzles
